about_the_game:
As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist.

Yet, here you are.

An outcast in a world that's not your own.

Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.

To you, things have always been black and white.

You've accepted your worth on this planet, and have accepted whatever torment the next day may bring.

You've accepted that you belong in captivity, locked away from the world, and have always been nothing more than some science project.

However, one day, in a spur-of-the-moment impulse...

...your entire life will change.

Features

  • Turn-based combat with quick-time based mechanics
  • An original soundtrack composed by Gemini and CT Zeal
  • Collectibles that unlock special moves
  • Exploration of both reality and the mindscape
  • A gripping story about learning the truth behind your existence and the man who created you

Content Warning

This is not a game for kids. Disturbing and unsettling topics and imagery will be prevelent.

content_descriptors.notes: Heavy and mature content including general violence, gore, usage of drugs and alcohol, and the exploration of themes such as coping with CPTSD will be explored. Discretion is advised.

As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist.

Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.

legal_notice:
"Luci RPG" by the Cats Nap Twice game studio. "Bebder Game" by bebder_game. "NOCT:Eternal" by CT_Zeal. "Luci" character by LuciDin. "Changed" by Dragon Snow. "Mogeko Castle" by Funamusea (Deep-Sea Prisoner). "Vinesauce" streaming channel and the Vineshroom by Vincent Franzetti.

All properties referenced have been given the greenlight by their respective creators, and are NOT under contract, meaning they can request their content be removed at any time.

name: Project: Shiba

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Supported

short_description: Take control of the world's first half-human hybrid and escape from captivity, fight to survive in a world you don't belong in, and explore both your new environment and the inner recesses of your mind, all while learning the truth behind your creation.
